name: @soulofmischief/feathers-configuration
description: A wrapper for node-config to integrate configuration data into a feathers app.
author: soulofmischief

scripts.publish:patch: yarn test && yarn build && npm version patch && cp -f package.json lib && yarn publish -f lib
scripts.publish:minor: yarn test && yarn build && npm version minor && cp -f package.json lib && yarn publish -f lib
scripts.publish:major: yarn test && yarn build && npm version major && cp -f package.json lib && yarn publish -f lib
